name: Max Payne Resource File
summary: Learn about .KF2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The Max Payne game uses several file formats to create the different aspects of the game environment. The KF2 is the most widely used format, along with, .KFS and .SKD files. These files are found within the .RAS archive file.

description: Game resource file used by Max Payne, a violent, third-person shooter noir video game; contains weapon models, projectiles, skyboxes and keyframe animations.
